title: The Glenn Beck Radio Show DEC-02-2013 MON
description:
The Glenn Beck Radio Show DEC-02-2013 MON




The Glenn Beck Program




Listen to The Glenn Beck Radio Program, Monday through Friday, 9am - 12pm ET


    
      
Monday, December 02, 2013 10:53 AM


Some interesting stories coming out of the weekend with Black Friday scuffles, Glenn shares.

   Also, Glenn shares the real meaning of Christmas and what Americans should focus on.

  Plus, Amazon.com announced it's plans for the future,
        delivering products via drones. 
           Is this something we want? 

 And Glenn sets the record straight between Nikola Tesla and Thomas Edison,
                                                     why you should know the truth.
